trend_summary: 2000-2020 imagery shows a mainly suburban landscape with scattered villages, forest and farmland. Built-up footprints enlarge gradually, especially new housing estates along the central spine road and an industrial/logistics park beside the airfield. A sand-and-gravel quarry grows markedly northwest, while cropland patches shrink and woodland cover increases in some valleys.
notable_changes: Progressive expansion of light-industrial/logistics blocks south of the runway complex.
Large quarry area appears and widens northwest, replacing cropland and hedgerows.
New residential subdivisions infill along the eastâ€“west arterial road, increasing roof density.
Reduction of open cropland; several fields revert to grass or young woodland.
Road network upgraded with new roundabouts and short connector segments supporting growth.
